remarks: The natural logarithm of positive ` A ` raised to an integer power. Property 4 of [Cohen] p. 301-302, restricted to natural logarithms and integer powers ` N ` .  (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 25-Nov-2007.)
statement: relogexp $p |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( log ` ( A ^ N ) ) = ( N x. ( log ` A ) ) ) $.
